text:
Mr. Fernand Terrou, President
July 13, 1959
Page 2
One further bit of information which would be helpful. We
would like to circulate information here on how various individuals
in this country and institutions, such as schools or universities,
can become members of the Association. Could you send me this inforÂ¬
mation, including cost in each case.
We are extremely interested in the Association and hope that
we can do something to further its goals.
Sincerely,
SLB:mw
Samuel L. Becker
Director, Division of
Television-Radio-Film
